LUNA SEA E.S.B.
Perfectly balanced and bursting with
big caramel, strawberry and citrus flavors,
with a crisp, dry finish. Pair with grilled
steak, salmon, BBQ, wild game and
caramel desserts.

THIRD STONE BROWN ALE
A myth-shattering ale that proves not all
dark beers have to be filling. Smooth and
refreshing, with a roasted nutty flavor.
Perfect with grilled beef, vegetables,
Southwest cuisine and caramel desserts

PEANUT BUTTER PORTER
A delightful aroma of peanut butter cup,
this beer maintains a porter backbone
with twisting layers of chocolate, peanut
butter and toast. Pair with grilled meats
curry, Thai, baked apples and chocolate

DARK SIDE VANILLA PORTER
Smooth, dark and roasted
with cosmic highlights of chocolate
coffee and vanilla. Divine with Indian
and Asian dishes, as well as beef,
chocolate and cheesecake.
